data.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - G3: Dungeons
data.detailed_description:
Treasure, mazes, and trapdoors... Oh my! What else could your labyrinth possibly need? Music that matches, of course!

This Dungeon pack contains ten different themes that will make your mazes come alive... Or feel dead. It's up to you! From heaven to hell, this song pack has what you need!

Tracklist:

1 - Dungeon001
2 - Dungeon002
3 - Dungeon003
4 - Dungeon004
5 - Dungeon005
6 - Dungeon006
7 - Dungeon007
8 - Dungeon008
9 - Dungeon009
10 - Dungeon010

Features:

  • 10 different dungeon themes. Make your caves sound deserted, or your enemy bases fully loaded.
  • Each song was carefully crafted for RPG Maker, and loops seamlessly in the program.
  • OGG format
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG Maker projects.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
